testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers to common questions about our services and process

items.question: How long does it take to complete a 1-page and 5-page website?
items.answer: A 1-page website typically takes 1-2 weeks, while a 5-page website usually requires 3-4 weeks. This includes design, development, revisions, and testing. Timeline may vary based on project complexity and feedback response time.

items.question: Do you offer ongoing support and maintenance services?
items.answer: Yes, we provide comprehensive maintenance packages including security updates, content updates, performance optimization, and technical support. Our maintenance plans start at $99/month and can be customized based on your needs.

items.question: How do I get started?
items.answer: Simply book a free consultation call with our team. We'll discuss your project requirements, goals, and timeline. After that, we'll provide a detailed proposal with pricing and project scope. Once approved, we begin with a 50% deposit.

items.question: What happens if I'm not satisfied with the final result?
items.answer: We offer unlimited revisions during the design phase and a 30-day satisfaction guarantee after project completion. If you're not completely happy, we'll work with you to make it right or provide a full refund.

items.question: Are there any additional costs I should be aware of?
items.answer: Our quotes are comprehensive and include all design and development work. Additional costs may include premium plugins ($50-200), custom integrations, or third-party services like hosting ($10-50/month) and domain registration ($15/year).

items.question: Do you offer website re-design services?
items.answer: Absolutely! We specialize in complete website redesigns to improve user experience, conversion rates, and modern design standards. We can work with your existing content or help create new content that better serves your goals.
